roleset.name: traveling
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: adjectival rel: transient
example.text: Her thyroid peroxidase antibody has come back positive and her thyroid stimulating immunoglobulin is negative , so this is most likely post-partum thyroiditis and it would be expected to resolve spontaneously over 6 - 12 weeks , possibly to enter a hypothyroid phase , which-1 [*-1] could be transient or permanent .
